MivoCloud Brings Us a Great Dedi Offer from Moldova: X5687 w/20TB of Bandwidth for €49/month!

dedi, iasi, mivocloud, moldova, moscow, oregon December 8, 2020 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

Welcome to LowEndBox, MivoCloud!  Alexandru contacted us with a nice dedi offer for our readers.  MivoCloud was the first IaaS provider in Moldova and we’re pleased to have them on board.

This offer is for a Xeon X5687 with 8GB RAM, tons (20TB) of bandwidth, IPMI, 1TB HDD or 250SSD located in Oregon for €49/month!

They’re using Supermicro and Dell servers on a Juniper-based network.  They offer a 99.977% SLA .

Also worth checking out is their public cloud, where they offer pay-per-hour prices starting at .007 € /hour for 1 core/ 1GB / 10GB SSD.

You read their Terms of Service, Privacy Policy, and SLA details on their web site.  Their WHOIS is public.  They accept Bitcoin, Paypal, VISA/Mastercard, Payeer, and Bank Transfer.

Here’s what they had to say: 

“We created a simple platform to bring new solutions and services for the contemporary market needs. Pay per hour Cloud Servers, Dedicated Servers, Virtual Private Servers, Shared Hosting and Managed Services. All members in our team are perfectionists and we are working hard every day to be better and better. We host in our own Data Centers the biggest online shops from Moldova. We offer an annual payment discount of up to 15%.”

Remember that LowEndBox thrives on people sharing their experiences, so if you give MivoCloud for a spin, please let us know how it goes!

Now read more to see the offer!

Intel Xeon X5687

  • 8 GB RAM
  • Intel XEON X5687 (3,60 GHz) CPU
  • 1 TB HDD or 250 GB SSD
  • 1 Gbps 20 TB
  • 1 IPv4
  • 1 IPv6 Subnet (/64)
  • IPMI Remote Access
  • DDoS Protection Included
  • Optional Server Management
  • €49/month
  • [ORDER]
Features:

  • Enterprise Hardware (Supermicro and
    Dell servers. Juniper based network.)
  • Optional additional IPv4
  • IPv6
  • Fast Setup
  • Professional and Fast support 24/7/365
  • Optional SSD
  • SLA 99.977%
